A frontend application that fetches all dynamic data from backend APIs
A backend API service that connects to a PostgreSQL database using specified environment variables
Obituary publishing functionality allowing users to create and manage obituaries
Funeral arrangements publishing functionality allowing users to create and manage funeral details
Mortuary list display showing available mortuaries with relevant information
Condolences messaging system enabling users to view and leave messages on others' obituaries
Statistical analysis dashboard displaying relevant metrics and data visualizations
User authentication and authorization system for managing personal obituaries and arrangements
Multimedia memory storage and display capability for images and videos
Responsive web design with cornsilk colored outer layout and peru colored UI blocks
Search functionality to find obituaries and funeral arrangements
Data persistence layer using PostgreSQL database for all dynamic content
Package.json configuration with 'install:all' script for installing frontend and backend dependencies
Package.json configuration with 'dev' script for running frontend and backend concurrently
RESTful API endpoints for all data operations including CRUD for obituaries, arrangements, and messages
